abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32697002, pmid32697000, pmid32640484, pmid32680942, pmid32691919, pmid32607737, pmid32673300, pmid32701052, pmid32692862, pmid32681650, pmid32681578, pmid32668034, pmid32646541, pmid32692890, pmid32680881, pmid32692350, pmid32691863, pmid32668062, pmid32651993, pmid32696734, pmid32651579, pmid32696967
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.27
